gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 121, Hornets 118
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Hornets, 121-118. Aaron Wiggins put up a season-high 26 points, along with five assists and a career-high six steals for the Thunder, while Josh Giddey added 20 points, 13 rebounds and 13 assists in the victory, his third triple-double of the season and 11th of his career. Grant Williams tallied a team-high 19 points for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Thunder improve to 53-25 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 19-59.
